caption.title: General distribution of gene expression in Anabaena sp. strain PCC 7120.
caption.p: (A) The FPKM boxplot distribution is shown with a box plot. (B) FPKM density distribution for all transcripts. Note: FPKM, fragments per kilobase of transcript per million mapped reads. ‘NDV’ and ‘NDH’ refers to vegetative cells and heterocysts cultured respectively under nitrogen deprivation condition, and ‘NV’ refers to vegetative cells cultured under nitrogen-replete condition.
